question: There are 6 periods in the day for a normal student but Ethan has to take 2 extra classes. Each class is 55 minutes long. He goes to class for 5 days a week. He then spends 1/10 of his weekly minutes each on Saturday and Sunday as extra learning time. How many hours a week does he spend learning?
answer:
He takes 6+2=<<6+2=8>>8 classes a day
That means he spends 55*8=<<55*8=440>>440 minutes per day in class
So he spends 440*5=<<440*5=2200>>2200 minutes a week
That means he spends 2200*1/10=<<2200*1/10=220>>220 minutes each on Saturday and Sunday.
So he spends 2200+220+220=<<2200+220+220=2640>>2640 minutes per week
So he spends 2640/60=<<2640/60=44>>44 hours per week
#### 44
